articles.description: Team India opener KL Rahul has been battling for form, especially in the longest format of the game. Since 2022, Rahul has turned out in 6 Tests but managed to score only 175 runs at an average of 15.9 with only 1 fifty.

articles.title: Injured David Warner ruled out of Border Gavaskar Trophy as Australia problems grow - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: Cricket News: Australia opener David Warner will return home from India and miss the last two Tests of the Border Gavaskar Trophy after an elbow fracture and concus
articles.content:
Another blow for the Aussies with David Warner heading home.@ARamseyCricket | #INDvAUS
